children.text: Cal Cup Championships will be held on July 12th and 13th at the legendary Manhattan Beach Pier. July 12th will feature 18U and 16U boys and girls and July 13th will feature 14U and 12U boys and girls. Championships is the highest level of play and will award special prizes--including scholarships to the 18U division winners.

This year, Cal Cup participants will earn their bid by finishing first place at a CBVA juniors event. Bids will be awarded to both teammates who win the event and they will be able to select the best partner possible for their entry into Cal Cup Championships.
Once a player has earned their bid, it will appear in their profile.
This event is first-come, first-served and will fill up quickly. Once it is full, we will not open additional spots.

Wildcard bids have been extended to select high-level international federations and domestic clubs outside of California. These invitations have been sent via email and expire at the end of April if not used. To request a bid as an International federation or club located outside of California, please email us at
